name: FlashBlock - Make much prettier
description:
============
Descriptions
============

Alter the FlashBlock placeholder to something more elegant. ;)

=======
Updates
=======

(7/15) Some minor touch
(8/26) Code optimization
(3/24) Code optimization, optional rounded corner
(4/2) Resolve possible updating problem due to new optional settings
css:
/* L.H.O.O.Q. FlashBlock Make much prettier */
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);div[style*="flashblock"] {background:url("data:image/png;base64,") center no-repeat,-moz-linear-gradient(top,#f0f0f0,#fdfdfd)!important;border:1px solid rgba(127,127,127,.4)!important;opacity:.89;box-shadow:inset 0 0 5px rgba(0,0,0,.2);/*[[radius]]*/-moz-transition:all .2s;}div[style*="flashblock"]:hover {border:1px solid rgba(127,127,127,.6)!important;opacity:.99;}
